content: In the following questions, I will provide you with a graph (given as an array of nodes and an array of edges), a starting point, and a target point. Please return the shortest path from the starting point to the target point in the following format: 1->2->3->4... Please note that your answer should only include the result in this format and should not contain any other words.

1->18->23->15

Therefore, the shortest path from node 18 to node 15 is 1->18->23->15. Please note that this is the shortest path in the graph and that there may be other paths that are longer or shorter depending on the specific starting and destination nodes.

1->18->23->15

Therefore, the shortest path from node 15 to node 18 is 1->18->23. Please note that this is the shortest path in the graph and that there may be other paths that are longer or shorter depending on the specific starting and destination nodes.
